XTextDocument.BodyText:
Fine Motor Function Measure (FMFM) Name： Sex： DoB： Month： Test date： Diagnosis： Type:■diplegia■quadriplegia■left hemiplegia■right hemiplegia■triplegia■athetosis■ataxia■dystonia■undefined Test position：□double hands □the side with bad function □the side with better function GMFCS Level:○Ⅰ○Ⅱ○Ⅲ○Ⅳ○Ⅴ MACS Level:○Ⅰ○Ⅱ○Ⅲ○Ⅳ○Ⅴ Item Score Item Score Section A Visual D06.reach out for the third square timbers A01.visual tracking by ringing bells D07.kick the cup by spoon A02.auditory tracking by ringing bells D08.turn to open the bottle and get the small pill A03.visual tracking by tennis from right to left D09.turn pages one by one A04.visual tracking by tennis from left to right D10.cut the paper A05.visual tracking by tennis from vertical D11.cut the paper into half Section B Movement function of upper limbs D12.unbutton B01.stretch arm in supine position and get the bell D13.paint the space between two lines B02.stretch arm in supine position and get the toy hanging on the top Section E: Hand-eye coordination B03.stretch arm in sitting position and get the bell E01.touch the small pill with fingers B04.stretch arm in sitting position and get the paper E02.make holes with fingers B05.cross hands in sitting position and play the square timber E03.put seven square timbers in the cup B06.open the book in sitting position E04.put four small pills in the cup B07.take the small pill from the bottle in sitting position E05.put timber pile inside BO8.touch yourself by hands in sitting position (nose-ears-head) E06.make a building with four square timbers B09.draw two vertical lines（3cm） E07.put some geometrical boards inside Section C: Ability to grasp E08.make a building with seven square timbers C01.grasp the square timber behind E09.build a train with four square timbers CO2.grasp one square timber with one hand each E10.link beads (6) C03.grasp the small pill (2) E11.draw vertical lines (5cm) C04.tear the paper E12.（5cm）draw horizontal lines (5cm)
C05.grasp the square timber (10cm in front of the kind) E13.drop small pills at once (10) C06.drop the square timber E14.threading (through six thin and long paper boards) C07.grasp two square timber with single hand E15.imitate ten characters C08.grasp the small pill E16.imitate the line C09.grasp the pen and draw E17.build the stair (6 square timber) C10.grasp the square timner with the first three fingers E18.imitate ten characters with different length Section D: Operation function E19.build the pyramid (12 pieces) D01.move three small timbers inserted on the board E20.link two points D02.hand over the square timber from the left hand to the right hand E21.imitate squares on the paper D03.knock the cup E22.trim a circle D04. link square timbers（2） E23.fold the paper D05. clap 3 E24.trim a square Total score: 3 Total score for fine movement function 3.33
